scripts.link_sint_modules: npm link sint-bit-jesus && npm link sint-bit-schema-manager && npm link sint-bit-cqrs
scripts.unlink_sint_modules: npm unlink sint-bit-jesus && npm unlink sint-bit-schema-manager && npm unlink sint-bit-cqrs
scripts.docker_compile: npm install && cd docker && sh compile.sh
scripts.docker_build: npm install && cd docker && sh build.sh
